project_descr: READY: Hazards Mapping and Assessment for Effective Community Based Disaster Risk Management (READY PHASE II)

outputs.output_descr: Multihazard identification and disaster risk assessment. Provincial hazard maps at 1:50 000 scale and municipal maps of 1:10 000 scale (Flood/Flashflood and Rain-Induced Landslide Susceptibility maps) are to be procued for target provinces.

project_title: multi hazard mapping and community disaster preparation
